title: Small Batches Get Big Play with Rafael Nodel
itunes:title: Small Batches Get Big Play with Rafael Nodel
description: Today on The Cigar Authority Rafael Nodel from Aging Room joins Dave Garofalo and Mr Jonathan as we light up the all new Aging Room M356. We also smoke an unnamed cigar that could be yours. Listen in for full details. It's time for the finer things in life.... It's time for The Cigar Authority!
